page.title: 07HOUSING IN KINNEFF AREA
page.content: The{types of houses} in this area are detached,semi_detached,terraced and bungalows.Most of the houses are in the village. Martin Terrace, a row of semi_detached{council houses}was built approximately 50 years ago. The newest houses in the village have been built over the last 20 years to replace the prefabs. Some of them have been specially built for old people. The oldest houses in the village are privately owned. In the last ten years about ten new {privately owned houses}have been built. One of them has solar panels fitted. The new manse was built to replace the large old manse that is now used as a{guesthouse.}Outwith the village we find mainly{farmhouses}and {'cottar'houses.}Less workers on the farms means, nowadays that these houses can be rented.
